Class MyVehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • acm.graphics.GObject
      • acm.graphics.GCompound
        • visualization.Vehicle
          • visualization.MyVehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    acm.graphics.GContainer, acm.graphics.GScalable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bus, Car

    public abstract class MyVehicle
extends Vehicle
    Behaves like a layer between Vehicle class and Bus/Car classes.
    Author:
    Enes Cakir
    See Also:
    Vehicle, Bus, Car, Serialized Form

        public boolean checkCollision(java.util.ArrayList<MyVehicle> vehicles)
        Checks collision of this vehicle with all the other vehicles on board.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
